website_summaries.verdict: This gun cleaning kit offers a variety of essential tools at an affordable price.
pros: Housed in an aluminum weather-resistant case are 28 pieces of versatility
Affordable price for everything you need to clean your collection of shotguns, rifles, and pistols
cons: Though the kit comes with a variety of pieces, many of the tools feel cheap and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little gun cleaning kit. It's probably not going to measure up to what some of the better gun stores are selling, but for the price it's hard to beat. It comes well equipped with everything you need to clean hand guns and long guns. It shipped quickly and arrived in excellent condition. I'm very pleased with this purchase and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LER North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, reasonably complete gun cleaning kit. I recently inherited a number of assorted guns and this one kit has the tools to clean most of my guns! (Prior to this, I had only a few smaller caliber guns so this assortment is really needed!) Although I haven't yet put it to work, it looks to have most of the tools that I will need. It is a good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben.G

customer_reviews.title: Great gun case
customer_reviews.text: Great gun case. Has all the parts I'll ever need for cleaning. I used it twice so far with good results. The bottom is some type of injection molded plastic. But the top is solid foam so I was able to cut a few holes in the top foam which allowed me to fit a bottle of gun oil and a small spray bottle of cleaner. This is great so that everything I need fits inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but completely Non-Functional!!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially thought this was okay, until I tried to use it. It looks great for the money, but doesn't function AT ALL. First, the T-handle had plastic flashing in the threads, so I couldn't even attach it to the rod. Even after attempting to clean the threads, it still would not attach. I ended up using the rod from my 40 year old Hoppe's kit, but then the wire brush pulled out and got stuck in the barrel of my Marlin .22 Model 60. This is going back!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for our handguns, and it works well. The rods are solid enough, the diversity of cleaning heads means I can use this for pretty much everything. I pulled the foam out though, cut it into smaller sections and used it inside my cleaning box, since I prefer everything to be in the one box. This box wasn't bad though, if it's all you are going to use, it'll be fine. Stiff enough to keep its shape with other things on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDadTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Kit
customer_reviews.text: Kit looks great in the metal case and I plan to use it frequently to help keep my weapons in top shape. Arrived promptly and was a great price. I recommend the kit. The number coded parts diagram included is helpful and may prevent accidental damage to a weapon's internal parts by using brushes inappropriate for cleaning internal parts and barrels.
customer_reviews.author: stardust

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet case. Not made to be thrown around or out in the field obviously. But nice none the less. Everything you'd need to clean a side arm really. I have no complaints with it, holding up just nicely. Not an overly bearing case, even has a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but the push rods are very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The brushes are good it's a nice little case but the rods are very poor quality. I broke the threaded inserts where they join together on two of them with very little pressure cleaning a 12 gauge and a .243. if I remember I'll post pictures when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: john norris

customer_reviews.title: More than you will need.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and complete kit. Holder tray is cheesy. There are far more little parts than most people will ever use. I cut out a space and added a bottle of Hoppe's. It is nicely made in a sturdy box. The box lid initially opened only 90 degrees. I bent it at the hinge so it would stay open.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: poor quality plastic parts.
customer_reviews.text: The .22 caliber piece you use to put the cloth on the rods to clean the barrel broke after a few uses. I'd greatly appreciate it if your company can send me just that part but maybe a better quality one so the same thing doesn't happen again. If you do I'd be very happy to upgrade my feedback. I hope to hear from you soon! Please resolve this very simple issue for continued customer loyalty...they sent me a new kit free of charge. I’ll try to be more careful with it and hopefully it’ll last longer, just remember some parts are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: arran

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good cleaning kit for the money. I gave it four stars instead of five because I feel that they could have printed the sizes on the inside of the lid instead of a small piece of paper that could get lost. Also, the packaging could have tabs or deeper slots to help hold in the many small parts a little better.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Everything feels cheaply made. Not suitable for gun cleaning. Only good thing in this kit was the patches. Then again, how could you mess those up
customer_reviews.author: Ericr8

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Like the hard case and all the options that come with it. I have many different calibers and to have tips and brushes all in one place is perfect. Rods aren't extremely strong but as long as you don't force it they are fine. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: star grace

customer_reviews.title: ALL YOU NEED
customer_reviews.text: GREAT ALL AROUND GUN CLEANING KIF ,NICE STURDY CASE ,HAS ALL THE SIZES THAT COVERS ALL MY GUNS VERY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE ,ARRIVED ON TIME BETTER THEN I EXPECTED WILL BE ORDERING MORE KITS TO GIVE AS GIFTS TO MY FAMILY & FRIENDS
customer_reviews.author: Clifford H Semler

customer_reviews.title: Fills the gaps in my gun cleaning repertoire
customer_reviews.text: I had a hodgepodge of rifle and pistol cleaning equipment that I had picked up over the years ... but still lacked this-or-that caliber or whatever. This kit filled those gaps ... so now I feel that I can handle any foreseeable gun cleaning in my future.
customer_reviews.author: JandT

customer_reviews.title: a LOT of parts
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a dedicated kit for cleaning and this is way more than I needed. My only complaint is I'm not overly fond of the cleaning pads in this kit. All the rods and attachments are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moody

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made and packaged. Everything is tagged with a caliber size that it cleans but so small and sloppily imprinted I used once and tossed.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell White

customer_reviews.title: Okay gun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good gun cleaning kit. Okay, not great. Kind of cheap, but gets the job done. You're definitely going to want a nice wire brush set but in all honesty I'd recommend getting a nice Hopps Bore Snake, they are fantastic and work amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mayer

customer_reviews.title: My husband was totally pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: My husband was totally pleased with this. It had everything he needed and then some. He had told several other people about this great deal. The case was more sturdy than I thought it might be. The rods were pretty sturdy also. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: 22 but if you take it easy you won't break it
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of cleaning gear but this does come with a rod that will clean .17 and the same rod is used for .22. A bit light for .22 but if you take it easy you won't break it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to this hobby and this was my first cleaning set. Let me tell you, I was not disappointed. The set comes with everything you'll need for all your gun needs. I did have one very minor issue and the seller was very kindly and resolved it immediately. Great product and even better seller!
customer_reviews.author: RShah

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price; but one of the guides was defective
customer_reviews.text: I guess the amount of items you get is ok for the price. But one of the guides had a defect - bad thread. So I cannot use the guide it to clean my Glock. You might be more lucky. Or might be not. I think I'd better buy a different cleaning set next time.
customer_reviews.author: GitRebase

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a quality product but I was wrong. The Case came cracked with the brackets holding the handle all mangled. The Wires are falling off of the brushes. I 100% would not recommend anyone buy this product. I recommend you go to your local Academy Sports and buy one from them. UPDATE: Was sent a replacement kit and it worked perfectly. The only complaint I still have about the kit is that the hinges that connect the top of the case to the bottom are riveted on, which causes minor cracks in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I like the price, I like the case it comes in. I also like the fairly comprehensive array of guns this takes care of. My one major issue is the handle will not thread on the rod. After many unsuccessful attempts, it almost looks as if they are different thread pitches. This makes it a nuisance when trying to pull the rod through a small caliber rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: Tools are good quality. Tubes are aluminum
customer_reviews.text: Handle may or may not fit, haven't been able to thread it onto a tube yet. Box looks aluminum but is actually plastic. Tools are good quality. Tubes are aluminum, of course. Overall satisfied but not quite worth $23.99, maybe $14.99 would be more like it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Record

customer_reviews.title: It worked until it broke
customer_reviews.text: The kit gets the job done, but it is definitely cheaply made. Mine lasted about 6 months before parts began breaking. I regret not having spent more on a better quality cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G.

customer_reviews.title: good kit at a resonable price
customer_reviews.text: Break my .22 cal. bore first use not happy about that, but still a good gun cleaning kit, I just need to be more careful how I insert the brushes
customer_reviews.author: HHA

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to clean a pistol or a rifle is right there in the case excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Tim jessop

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice box and the cleaning poles are actually pretty strong
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice box and the cleaning poles are actually pretty strong. I wouldn't go around jerking these in your barrels(phrasing?) but as long as you're careful, they should last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P

customer_reviews.title: One kit for multiple guns.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit works for multiple guns. Has everything you need to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and all the parts are very nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case easy to travel with and has alot of nice brishes to clean all your different calibers. Very sturdy case.
customer_reviews.author: Pks

customer_reviews.title: Works, but quality is a bit lacking
customer_reviews.text: It works, but the threads in the handle don't match up with the adapters. It needs a bit more de-burring and work on the various adapters. It does what it's supposed to though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Estes

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy and it got the job done that i needed to get done with my guns
customer_reviews.author: Dmanor

customer_reviews.title: Barely functional.
customer_reviews.text: Convoluted attachments, confusing to piece together. Plastic jag threads stripped first use. Not a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hackenberg

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good case
customer_reviews.text: Amazing kit for the price. I wanted one with a trustworthy case as I’ve had a few fall apart. I don’t see this one failing anytime soon. More then tough enough for its job. All contents are good quality. Definitely gets the job done for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Gun Cleaning brushes
customer_reviews.text: Does what I expect it to do. The only issue with this kit was that there were no cleaning solvents associated with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Case is a nice feature. I use this for travel when hunting and it’s perfect. Not as good quality as what I have at home but didn’t expect it to be especially for the cost
customer_reviews.author: S. Deronne

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the Man
customer_reviews.text: This made a great Christmas gift for my husband. The fancy box it came in and how shiny all the tools were made it have that extra special feel to it. Great quality and durably made this kit was.
customer_reviews.author: Lights UP North

customer_reviews.title: Works Well Enough, Some Room For Improvements
customer_reviews.text: The pushrod bends easily, and not all listed components are in the spots on the diagram. In addition, I wish it came with patch holding pieces to run through the barrel, I had to purchase those separately from Walmart. Not bad for a cheap gun cleaning kit, but I would definitely recommend buying a few extra pieces and and different pushrod
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good cleaning kit for the price. The push robs are not as well made as I would have liked. They bent a little out of shape, but that is because they are made from aluminum. Other then that the rest of the equipment is good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gentile

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good kit...iser must be very careful because it is plastic made. Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Straight to the Point
customer_reviews.text: I also use it to clean the crud out of my clarinet.
customer_reviews.author: Craig K Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Ohuhu gun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit arrived on time and in good condition. Convenient to have all calibers in one kit. Don't have to look for separate cal kits. No matter what gun I'm cleaning, it's all there.
customer_reviews.author: E. Delligatti

customer_reviews.title: 10+ guns ? this is a must.
customer_reviews.text: wow lots of things for all types of guns . if you have 10+ guns this is a must.. but does not come with oils , lubes or bore cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: stretch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are stainless rods, if you are tired of brass ones breaking , order you one of these
customer_reviews.author: dougbiggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a Christmas gift for a couple men in my life. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my shotgun, rifle, and pistol. Has every thing I need and cost much less than many kits in the market place!
customer_reviews.author: jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for my nephew and half sister. The case made me jealous and is solid but light. The rods are good for what they are along with the rest of the cleaning ends and brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone who owns guns
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice cleaning kit` you can clean a lot of different guns with this
customer_reviews.author: country guy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but decent value.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product but does a decent job. I broke one of the tips so now it’s almost useless until I get a replacement. Worked great until I did that.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Made it thru one cleaning and Items feel kinda cheaply made, needs a little finesse.
customer_reviews.author: jason crowley

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise i like
customer_reviews.text: One of the small pieces broke already. But its a cheap fix. Otherwise i like it
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Torjman

customer_reviews.title: A lot more for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my fiance a few months ago. The case is great and sturdy and the cleaning rods are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Might look for something else.
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice and it came as shown BUT... when I opened it it felt like it had already been used. Mine came covered in soot or grease or something and it feels sort of “jinky.” I only use it for my 9mm and you have to screw together 2 different adapters that BARELY fit together to even use the bronze or the mop. Still does the job but feels pretty cheap. It’s not a user friendly set.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine but it feels like it is cheaply made. Hopps has a much higher quality kit.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: items fit well in the bore and brushes seem to be holding up well, after a dozen uses. Everything I need in one box and of good quality, plenty of rods for rifles with 26" plus barrels
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaning kit. It has everything I need at a good price. The case is sturdy. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: brsmith629

customer_reviews.title: All pieces included and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. Able to clean all my weapons. Everything needed to clean the weapons.
customer_reviews.author: rosborne54

customer_reviews.title: be neat and look like you know what for!
customer_reviews.text: very nice. let me throw away a collection of odds and ends
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and my husband uses it to clean his stuff! Highly like it because it keeps all his tools together!
customer_reviews.author: 29asw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You have everything you need to clean your guns in only one box!!
customer_reviews.author: gabriel marcos

customer_reviews.title: It does the job it should do.
customer_reviews.text: Well I like most all the set. I cleaned a 410 and a 12 gauge. Did a really good job. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Garlington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dad liked it very much. It cleans multiple guns too. So everyone is pleased. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ronald V. Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starting kit!
customer_reviews.text: It has everything that you will need for an average cleaning kit. I would suggest this for any new or experienced gun users. It is a great kit to start with. You will need to buy oil seperate.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Roberts

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my father, and I know he will love it. It is high quality cleaning tools, and definitely looks legit. For the price, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JBB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has all the sizes I need in one kit and quality is above average.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, better than expected, bought it for my dad, might buy it for myself
customer_reviews.author: Cody Damron

customer_reviews.title: Everything looked good but the rod was flimsy and broke when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked good but the rod was flimsy and broke when I pulled the cleaning attachment out of my riffle.
customer_reviews.author: Anson

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning kit, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning kit. I have used it on both a rifle and a handgun.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gun cleaning kit, in a sturdy aluminum box, at a good price, just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tex F. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. I purchased this for my Smith & Wesson M&P 9mm shield. I also intend on purchasing an AR-15 in the near future in which this cleaning kit will also work with.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Miller

customer_reviews.title: A solid value
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit contains everything you should need for you weapon maintenance. Arrived quickly and well packaged. Nice price for such a complete kit.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality, but good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decent value. Not the greatest quality, but good value for the price tag
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: Everything i needed in a nice case!
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for, since it has everything that i needed. Cleans easy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Au By

customer_reviews.title: Covers every caliber in my collection and does an excellent job with all of the components
customer_reviews.text: High quality cleaning kit. Covers every caliber in my collection and does an excellent job with all of the components. The case is nice quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Am I in the matrix?

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, it has all you need. Just wish it had space for extra cleaning tools.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This set does the job of cleaning and oiling my 12 gauge and 9 mil
customer_reviews.author: Losun L. Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: but the product itself is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Case seems a little lightweight, but the product itself is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AAron Winn

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Missing many needed parts for proper gun cleaning and the brushes don't properly fit in two.of the most common gun barrels .223 and 12 gauge.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. Missing a brush for a 22 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Missing a brush for a 22 and 30/30. The ones in the kit are not long enough. Other than that, husband liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: just annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you'll need to clean your firearms properly. One star reduction because the case won't open past 90°, so it won't stay open until you find a "sweet spot" and when you do find it the slightest touch causes it to shut automatically. Not a deal breaker, just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's purpose perfectly, able to use on all my guns of different calibers including shotguns. Convenient storage case and a map showing clearly which caliber each brush and broom works for.
customer_reviews.author: anthony berni

customer_reviews.title: kind of an incomplete kit
customer_reviews.text: there is no handle for the smaller , rifle cleaning rod ?? kind of disappointing. I'm going to look for something else ....maybe I have to spend a little more $ ??
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband and he absolutely loves it so much so that he wants to buy one for my son
customer_reviews.author: Terri medici

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy but it gets the job done when you have multiple different calibers to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Turbognx

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked for all my long arms and pistols. Great kit that covers a majority of sizes. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband as a BD gift. He loves it! Has everything he needs and wanted in the kit. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie M Carrel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything ive needed to clean my gun besides the chemicals
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: nice kit in a nice case. I can now clean all my handguns and rifles. Be sure to add solvent and necessary oils, etc to your order.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but expected
customer_reviews.text: The material used for the cleaners is a bit cheap, but for this amazing price that is expected. A great product that I will use very often.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy case with all the right tools. Can't go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Super frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. None of the parts fit together. The connections are bigger diameter than the rods and don't fit in the barrel. Not enough total length to reach all the way through. I broke one of the pieces out of the gate. Super frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Norman

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a 223
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options, but can't clean a 223 rifle barrel
customer_reviews.author: Dan McCasland

customer_reviews.title: Worst gun kit ever and unable to return
customer_reviews.text: Worst gun kit ever and unable to return. Poles are flimsy and won’t make it down a barrel. No fittings fit. The handle doesn’t mount to any attachments. Overall cheap and poorly made. Totally worthless. Wouldn’t trust putting any of these components in any of my firearms.
customer_reviews.author: Steven w.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It will do the job but you get what you expect for the price, cheap, flimsy, fragile parts.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Turk

customer_reviews.title: good product. Like the way it is compact yet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, good product. Like the way it is compact yet plenty of tools/accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unit was as advertised and seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Spiff

customer_reviews.title: it's a good
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of pieces for all my guns, for the price, it's a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: its ok but looks a lot nicer online then when received
customer_reviews.author: sue delong

product_meta.title: Ohuhu Gun Cleaning Kits Brushes and Jags for Hand Gun, Rifle & Shot Gun with Carrying Case
product_meta.description:
Keep your firearms in top notch condition with Ohuhu’s universal gun cleaning accessory kit.

Cleaning your guns is a must to keep them in tip-top shape. Invest in a kit that will last you a lifetime! With the Ohuhu Gun Cleaning Kit, you’ll have everything you need to clean pistols, rifles, shotguns, muzzleloaders, and more.
The wide variety of tools guarantees a thorough clean for each and every type of gun. This kit is tough as nails and will last for years to come.
Got a big hunting trip planned? We’ve included a weather-resistant storage case to take this kit on the go! Each component has its own special slot so that you stay tidy. Thanks to Ohuhu, gun maintenance has never been easier. 

Specifications
-Package Dimension: 11.8 x 7.9 x 2.0inch
-Weight: 1.78lbs

Package Includes:
-1 x Universal handle
-3 x Shotgun rods:
-3 x 17-45cal. Pistol/rifle rods:
-1 x Handle adaptor for .17cal rods:
-1 x Aluminium accessory adaptor:
-2 x Slotted tips:
-10 x . Brush (10/12ga, 20/28ga, 410, .40cal, .45cal, .357/38cal, .17cal, .30cal, .270/280cal, .22 cal ):
-5 x 10/12 ga. Cleaning mop (10/12 ga, 20/28 ga, 410, .357/38cal, .22cal, ):
-1 x Cleaning patch set:
-1 x Aluminium carry case
feature_bullets: ALL-IN-ONE: You can find 28 pieces of cleaning accessories that you need for all types of shotguns, rifles and pistol in this kit
6 RODS: 3 pieces of stainless steel shotgun rods and 3 pieces of stainless steel rifle rods
10 DIFFERENT SIZED BRUSHES: 10 pieces of Brass cleaning brush for different size – (10/12, 20/28, 410, 45, 40, 357/38, 17, 30, 270/280, 22)
5 COTTON BRUSHES: 5 pieces of cotton cleaning Brush (10/12, 20/28, 410, 357/38, 22)
